description: Trove Attributes allows you to define identifiable "numbers" (Attributes) on entities, and add/remove "rules" (Modifiers) that affect the evaluation of these numbers' values. Modifiers are reactive, and can make the value of a certain attribute depend on the value of another. This tool can be used to effortlessly setup gameplay mechanics such as RPG character/equipment attributes, buffs, effects, roguelike-style stackable powerups and synergies, etc...
name: com.trove.attributes

samples.description: Customizable code files living in the user's project, used by the attributes system
